name: About Time (Bstrct)
description:
This is my first IF game. I've been intrigued by the genre since quite some time and had the last push while sawing the #AdvXJam event. The theme is "A good time". I first thought of the quiet moment when the dust settles after a tragedy. However, the more I think about it, the more I question myself about what is "a good time" ?

Finally, I took a more literal approach, but this is not an essay either. Just a slice of life between two characters who may or may not fall in love, depending on subtle shifts in time.

I really enjoyed my experience and If you like the result too, the best you can do is give me some feedbacks. Either here in the comments or @_btstr_ct on Twitter. I learned the hard way I should have narrowed my scope earlier. On the bright side, it means there is still plenty I'd like to explore on this project.
